author: paul
text: I'd love to be able to see the cards updated to TALLY up the total cost for each project. Have an estimated cost and then have a spot that shows the true cost that I have spent in API costs or anything associated with the project. Maybe even add a tab within the panel or model that could reflect costs like that. Write up a detailed PR to add this feature

author: paul
text: I would also like to see a section of all of the models that were used on the project. There could likely be way more than 1 working on it. It would be cool to see the tasks that were associated with the project. Maybe we could work out a system that tracks all of the tasks that were done for each project.
